body_html: I don't think the set of names for which tf.RegisterGradient() has been called is sufficient for validating the override map keys... for example a common use is to register a temporary gradient for an op that doesn't in general have one.
body_text: I don't think the set of names for which tf.RegisterGradient() has been called is sufficient for validating the override map keys... for example a common use is to register a temporary gradient for an op that doesn't in general have one.
body: I don't think the set of names for which `tf.RegisterGradient()` has been called is sufficient for validating the override map keys... for example a common use is to register a temporary gradient for an op that doesn't in general have one.
